attributes.action: To make Mental Health a compulsory lesson in school
attributes.additional_details: mental health is one of the biggest killers for young men and its also a silent killer and you don't know whether someone close to you is suffering till it is too late but if it got introduced into a school as a lesson it will make young students less embarrassed to open up about there feelings and are able to understand what their body is going through
attributes.background: I want the government to introduce a compulsory lesson about mental health whether that's being included in a biology lesson or a separate lesson altogether like 'life skills'

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petition calling for similar actions: 

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Provide more funding to schools for mental health programmes: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/574673

Make mental health awareness part of the national curriculum at all levels: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561016

Fund a national awareness campaign for mental health in schools: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553711
